Data.Point

Documentation

class (Ord e, Num e) => Point p e | p -> e where

Methods

dimensions :: p -> Int

element :: Int -> p -> e

diff2 :: p -> p -> Int -> e

compareDistance :: p -> p -> p -> Ordering

compareDistance p a b compares the distances of a and b to p.

dist2 :: p -> p -> e

dist2 returns the squared distance between two points.
